Vehicle.title: Vehicle
Vehicle.description: Represents a vehicle available for booking in the transportation company's fleet.

name.description: The model name of the vehicle (e.g., LiXiang L7).

descriptionKey.description: A i18n key for a detailed description of the vehicle.

imageHint.description: A hint for AI image generation services.

featureKeys.description: A list of i18n keys for features offered by the vehicle.

priceKey.description: A i18n key for the pricing information.

Booking.title: Booking
Booking.description: Represents a booking made by a customer for a vehicle.

userId.description: Reference to the UserProfile who made the booking.

bookingDate.description: The date and time for which the booking is made.

contactMethod.description: The preferred contact method chosen by the customer (Telegram, WhatsApp, Call).

message.description: Any optional message the customer may provide regarding the booking

UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's public profile and roles.

uid.description: The user's unique ID, matching their Firebase Auth UID.

isAdmin.description: Whether the user has administrative privileges.

definition.description: Stores vehicle information. Writable only by admins.

params.name: vehicleId
params.description: The unique identifier of the vehicle.

definition.description: Stores user profile information and roles. The document ID must match the user's auth UID.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier of the user.

definition.description: Stores booking information for each user.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier of the user making the booking.

params.name: bookingId
params.description: The unique identifier of the booking.

firestore.reasoning: This Firestore structure is designed for a vehicle booking application with an admin role. It separates public data (vehicles) from user-specific data (profiles and bookings). User roles (isAdmin) are stored within the user's profile document, allowing security rules to perform role-based access control. Bookings are a subcollection under each user, enforcing ownership and simplifying security rules.
